column5: Enjoy this beautiful 2 bedroom house situated on top of a ridge with a 180 degree, 40 mile panoramic view of the hill country from the spacious front deck. Gorgeous sunsets, moonlight bonfires and native wildlife viewing are daily activities at our peaceful 9 acre property. 6 miles from the wineries, Luckenbach dance hall, Old Tunnel bat cave state park, and a quick 10 minute drive into downtown Fredericksburg. Private gate, full kitchen. Zero light pollution for incredible star gazing!
